p.s: The novel The Great Gatsby published in the year 1925 written by F. Scott Fitzgerald is a classic of the 20th century.
It's story takes place in the roaring twenties.
The given excerpt from the novel shows the moment where Gatsby finally meets with his love from a long time ago, Daisy.
He still loves her and tried everything to get her attention.
He then asked Nick a newly made friend of him to invite her over without telling her that he will be there so he can finally see her again.
That brings us to the given excerpt.
When Daisy arrives Nick tells her to come into the house with him where Gatsby should be waiting for them.
When they come in Gatsby is gone and Nick goes to answer the door where he convinces the scared Gatsby to come in and meet Daisy.
Moreover the first couple of minutes both Gatsby and Daisy were embarrassed however Nick could tell that Daisy was very happy to see Gatsby again.
After some time Nick leaves the room to give them some space, followed by Gatsby which he convinces again to go back in to Daisy.
When the weather clears up Nick decides to go back in where he meets them.
Now extremely happy and also very emotional.
Gatsby and then invites both Nick and Daisy over to his mansion.
